column3: Traffic;Phnom Penh: A woman driving a Prius with license plate Phnom Penh 2AY-1882 drove through a traffic light too fast swerved to avoid a man riding a black Honda Click motorcycle with license plate 1-1995
column5: hitting a man reading a newspaper sitting on a tuk-tuk
column6: the car continued and only came to a stop after hitting a street light pole
column7: causing damage.------Two people were slightly injured and were taken to a private hospital. The incident occurred on August 8
column8: 2020 at the Wat Langka traffic light on the corner of Sihanouk and St. 51
column13: was named as the driver of the Prius
column14: who told police that before the incident
column15: she was driving on Sihanouk from west to east when the traffic light turned red. A man driving a Honda Click motorcycle with a police license plate crossed the road on Route 51 in a north-south direction. The car swerved and hit the tuk tuk parked on the sidewalk.  The woman driver was not injured and did not escape.------Phnom Penh Municipal Traffic Police Office came to inspect the scene and said the car was driving recklessly and was speeding. ------PPR
